item.description:
Film starts at 7:00 pm. I'll be there around 6:45 pm.

Just in time for the World Cup. A wry comedy starring Eric Catona, a famous French footballer (soccer). "Looking for Eric", the wonderfully wry new film from British director Ken Loach, is a melencholy comedy about wins and losses in soccer, life and love, and the power of a few pals, a few pints and the estoeric musings of a French footballing superstar to carry you through.

I saw this film in Palm Springs and it is a great film. I'm glad it has come to Hartford.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Looking For Eric
